name: Space Scrap Shuffle
description:
Collect modules from destroyed enemy ships to grow your own. Not happy with where a turret is attached? Pop it off and put it somewhere else! Reconfiguring the layout of your ship could be the reason you survive... or it could be the reason you die.  Survive the onslaught of enemies as you try to make your way to the warp gates.

NOTE: There is a critical bug in the jam submitted version that causes enemies to stop spawning at Sector 6. We hope you are able to enjoy the game up to this point and we hope you can see the potential of the game design here! In the version submitted for the game jam you are not able to progress past Sector 6!


Controls

  • WASD To Move
  • Q & E To Rotate
  • Space for Tactical Pause
  • Left Click on Modules for context menus

Created for the 2021 GMTK Jam   

Theme: Joined Together
